text:
@narendramodi Lockdown karo, tho people complain, na karo, tho people complain.
Just say that the government is ‘suggesting’ that people take the following steps to remain safe. There will be no enforcement of lockdown until a local governing body asks for it. #COVID__19 #COVID19 #WearAMask
